name: Really Real Repairmen
description:
You have been promoted to be a repairman for your job and your first house you are working with Jerry, the annoying coworker from your previous job.

Look at items in the house and hold down left click to repair items and wait for the circle timer to run out

This game was created for the 2020 Global Games Jam, link to the jame site upload https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/really-real-repairmen-3

Credits
